description: This file defines a React functional component 'ProductDetail' that displays detailed information about a specific product, fetched via an API call using the product ID from URL parameters. It handles loading state, error state, and provides an interface to add the product to a shopping cart. It imports external components, hooks, and services related to product data, cart management, and routing.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function that fetches product data based on the URL parameter 'id' and updates component state accordingly.
